Description: Hello, I've never had a bf or had sex before, I have kissed and done a bit of other stuff but that is as far as it goes. ;The problems is I've not been like my friends when they were 16 about liking them, I have had quite a lot of guys ask me out/show interest, but I didn't feel the same and I always feel that would not be the right path for me. ;a recent event, this guy I liked at work (who I think is a little bit of player) he invited me to stay over, so I did, and well we ended up making out etc, infact it was moving so fast he was pretty much getting ready to put on a condom, I thought before if I kept my virginity secret it wouldnt matter, but then I was worried about the pain as he seemed pretty rough/moving fast so I told him before he did anything, ;I was suprised that he reacted how he did, he said he didnt want to be an arsehole by taking my virginity, and we ended up just making out and stuff instead all night, he did ask me at one point if I wanted him to continue anyway but I said I felt kind of rubbish so we didnt go further, ;But this guy was so sweet to me after, he said we could just cuddle all night, he said he did like me but wasn't looking for a relationship, he also noticed I kept looking sad, and kept making sure I was ok by kissing and cuddling me and asking me to smile, and trying to reassure me that I was a nice cool person and that I should stop talking rubbish about myself. ;Now I like him even more because he has proven though he might be a bit of a player he can be sweet and caring too and didn't just take advantage, im stuck in a rut :( ;I feel paranoid when i see him at work im worried hes freaked oiut he told me I was being paranoid and sent me a message online saying i needed to relax and let things flow" I Two backstabbing "best" friends....I need advice?
Description: A friend of mine showed me a chat conversation between two of my other friends.  In this conversation they were talking about me being upset that they flaked on my boyfriend's birthday party.  The day after they flaked, I talked to Chris (one of the chatters) to ask why she didn't call and told me she wasn't coming, and I told her I was upset.  The conversation ended with her apologizing, even though I didn't ask for one.  So I thought everything was fine, and everyone was over it.  Well Samantha shows me this conversation (not much of a friend either I guess) and its Chris and Kelly tearing me to shreads.  They called me manipulative, disgusting, pathetic, how I always play the victim, fake, on and on and on....  Funny they say all this because I'm the least emotional and I'm not really a gossipper.  I hate lying and make sure I don't!    These girls are supposed to be my two best friends.  I know those are some pretty generic things to say about whomever you hate, but I'm really not fake.  I've never lied to them, I've always been there for them.  Unlike them, I don't slather on makeup, have fake hair extensions, or gossip about my friends like they did.  I know what they said is not true, but it really hurts me.  If they really meant it, why would they say something that's not true.  I'm trying to be a strong, but this really upsets me.  Nothing like this has ever happened to me. I need some advice....

Title: Does a contested temporary guardian have the right to sell the elderly persons property?
Description: My grandma is relatively healthy, but has not been very good with her money the last couple years. She has refused to let anyone handle her finance. The whole family knew something need to happen, but unknown to the rest of the family, my Uncle was going through the process of becoming my Grandmothers legal guardian to take control of her finances. He really has had nothing to do with her until now, he has a sudden interest just becuase he wants to buy her house and car from her for way below value and then put her in a nursing home. When the rest of the family found out, they went to the court hearing which was going to make it final, but my Aunt contested it (for good reason). My Aunt has been the one primarily taking care of/spending time with her and she wants to have my Grandma come living with her. Now there has been a hearing set 2 months from now. My uncle just called my Mom to let her know he was going to go ahead and sell Grandmas car and house to his friend this weekend. My questoin is: Does a temporary guardian have the right to sell the elderly persons property and belongings while his temporary guardianship has been contested and there is a future court hearing?

Title: The proportion of patients in a large medical database who survived a heart transplant operation is 0.8.?
Description: Assume that randomly sampling 20 heart-transplant patients from this database satisfies (at least approximately) the conditions of a binomial experiment.  ; ;1)What is the expected number of patients in a sample of 20 that survive the heart-transplant operation? What is the standard deviation of this binomial distribution? ; ;2)What is the probability that all heart-transplant patients in a sample of 20 survive the operation? ; ;3)What is the probability that between 15 and 17 patients (inclusive) in a sample of 20 survive the operation? ; ;4)What are the median and quartiles of the distribution of 20 heart-transplant patients? Title: Should I ignore my babyfather's family too?
Description: Okay. Sorry to sound stereotypical and ignorant (disclaimer) but my son's father or sperm donor and I have been heavily estranged since my son was conceived. After not getting an abortion, he abandoned us and to this day has only seen his son maybe 5 times and no longer than 20 minutes each time. He has given me ZERO support financially, physically or otherwise---so I had been moved on. I am now engaged to a wonderfully supportive guy who has basically adopted my son as his own and we are also expecting another son together in January 2012. I went for chuld support on my oldest son's father back when he was only 3 weeks and to this day the case has never developed (due to them being unable to successfully locate him) So, today I randomly see him at our local mall and I could tell he was shocked. I ignored him and didn't flinch. But this evening, I have gotten a call from his Aunt's house (where he use to stay) and his sister has text me asking me how me and my son are. I hate to be petty, but my number has not changed, and my son's 1st brthday came and went without any acknowledgment from him or ANY of his family---so now that he was shocked after months of no contact to see me---he expects me to be answering to his family's inquiries...and I have no motivation to do so.

Title: Met a girl for coffee yesterday and she showed up shoeless?
Description: She had me meet her at a coffee shop on the ground floor of a high-rise condominium building,  We seemed to hit it off pretty good, and suggested after an hour we go see a movie at the cineplex down the block, ; ;At that point she said she needed to run upstairs to her condo (That's when I learned she lives right there), and that's when I noticed that she just had on socks, but not shoes. So when she comes back down in a few minutes (with her Ugg boots on), I asked her about it and she said she had been wearing shoes all along.  and told me I was crazy to thing otherwise, so I let the matter drop ; ;Later on she invited me back to her place and when she removed her shoes I noticed that her socks were really dirty on the bottom, so I am pretty sure I was right. I think she might have kicked her boots off at the movie, but that wouldn't really account for them being that dirty. They were white, so it was easy to notice them ; ;I don't care one way or another about her feet, but it seems like this was a crazy thing to lie about. Description: I am 19 yrs old.studing in a college(class 12).my exams are coming ahead.i did good in my school exam(gpa 5 out of 5).to get admitted in a medical college i must score 5 out of 5 in my hsc exam.but my preparation is so bad for the xm.i used to be a good student.i don't know what happened to me.i still have 20 days till the exam starts. Everyone is telling me not to quit.but i have lost faith in me.i m thinking of escaping the exams and try for it in next year.they are saying that those who quit don't get a better result the next time.but all i need is about 2.5 months to get in a better position. My gf is doing good.she's gonna attend the xm and she will hopefully get an a+.i am also worried about that cz if i can't make it i ll fall behind of her.i guess it will make problem in our future life.there is no pressure from my family about xm.but anyhow i have to do good in the xm.none seems to understand me. Everybody is telling me that i will do good and also suggests me to attend next year if i fail or something.Finally i HAVE LOST ALL MY HOPES.i am just thinking that next year will be better.i need only a few days to improve myself.every morning i start my studies with new hope and very soon after that something happens.e.g can't get enough mark in tests, private tutor gets mad at me as i am not doing well etc.....so should i quit this year and try harder for next year?..please please tell me what to do. ; ;I am weak in physics and math.i know that i won't score more than 65-70%in this two.thats not enough for me.please don't think me as a nerd or something.this exam means everything to me.i think my life depends on it.sometimes i think of suicides .please suggest me something good.if u can't please remember me once when u pray.........

Title: Why do you hate breeders?
Description: Look I know people say that every dog in the world should be spayed and neutered because of animal over crowding in shelters, and animal's getting euthanasied. Right? Well, I think that's common sense to a point. But If someone breeds their dog; it doesn't make them an irresponsible dog owner. There are thousands of kids in orphanages and foster care, yet you don't bash someone for deciding to get pregnant and not adopting? It's the same concept. If a family breeds a dog its their decision, and don't deserve to get criticized for it. I don't encourage byb's who do it for a profit. But honestly being critical of others doesn't save any animals lives? Then my question is why do it? And ps. I have 2 shelter dogs which I love dearly but i recently got a purebred husky from a reputable breeder, why? Because I wanted one and paid good money for him.

Title: I often have similar dreams about this boy.. explain?

But then seeing him while queuing for a concert, and his is with another girl who had the same name as me ; ;-he starts talking to me and I am mean to him, calling him names but then realise I'm pushing him away so am nicer ; ;-he text me asking to meet him in america. (We live in england but I go to america once a year) ; ;-he sat next to me in class and started licking my arm. Then we made friends and this dream felt so real and I was happy ; ;- we were dancing to a song together which was about saying sorry for ignoring me ; ;-i was pregnant and he was the dad. He put a facebook status about being excited to be a father. The one of my friends told him to speak to me so we started texting and being nice how we used to be but I still was like why is he speaking to me ; ;-i was kissing another boy with other boys in the room but all I could think of was him ; ;-it was in the future and we were in a relationship. Title: Desperate to increase milk production!?
Description: To clarify some things based on the answers I've received- The baby barely latches. I have a nipple shield and when I try to breastfeed he screams and screams and screams. I'm lucky if he latches for 10 minutes. In other words, if I attempt to latch him while he's still groggy, he'll latch, but as soon as he's awake completely, he will try to spit out my breast and start gagging because he doesn't want it.  ; ;As for bottle feeding, the lactation consultant had the nursery start him that way because he didn't eat for a day and a half and wasn't latching due to a bad reflux condition he was born with. It wasn't until just before I left the hospital on day 3, they gave me a nipple shield, which he took to, but only lasted a couple minutes, then tried to spit out the breast and start gagging. Pumping was also the lactation consultant's recommendation as well as my doctor, and his pediatrician. ; ;I try to breastfeed, I really try... but the kid screams

Title: My rose bush has no leaves and never bloomed?
Description: So i planted my rosebush last year during the early spring and it bloomed a few weeks later. It had two really pretty pale pink roses that were just awesome! Then it bloomed again in the fall. This year though, it did not bloom at all. In fact it looked like something had eaten the leaves because they had little holes in it. Well, it lost all of its leaves except one small branch. It is green on the stems but has no leaves but little blooms on ends of the blooms. I don't think it has a disease, but it didn't bloom but my neighbor's bloomed and so did my grandma's this year. Does anyone have an ideas? My mums look fine and should bloom soon. If anyone can offer help then please do. Thanks!

Title: Any Packers fans out there worried about Randy Moss?

Title: Have asked this recently but more men insight please?? I'm baffled!?
Description: Hi there. I was recently dating a guy for four months and we are both in our mid 20's. He was a friend of a friend and I heard that he could be quite shy, which was ok with me. ;It was going well in the first couple of months and he was very keen to speak to me daily and see me a couple times a week. I moved into my first home and he would visit regularly, however did not want to go out and have fun, just sit and watch DVD's and cuddle up on the sofa! He also started staying the night (about 6-8 times in total over the period of a month). However, he did not actually initiate anything in bed! It must of happened twice in that time, and when it did, it was over within minutes. He apologised and said it was because he really liked me and was a bit nervious. This man is gorgeous and we got on well, so I said it didn't matter and would see how it panned out. ;He then started backing off and wasn't so keen to speak to me as much so asked him about it. He said we were fine but he wanted to take it slow as he was wary of commitment, having been single for a few years. I said it was ok as I had been to. ;He then went away on holiday for a week and text me whilst he was there, which was reassuring. He came home and visited me twice, and again I asked if he wanted to go out and do something, which he said no, he wanted to chill out. We got intimate, but it was very quick again and he said it was because it had been quite a while (didnt I know it!!) and I 'turned him on too much'. I didnt push it forward and he went home. ;I didnt really hear much over the next 10 days or so, just a few texts. So I asked if it was over, and he replied that he was sorry but it hadn't really worked and there wasn't any chemistry between us. ;He had always been quite affectionate and had even told his family and friends we were dating. He now won't come to collect his DVDs, despite me saying I will leave them in my porch for him. He wants a mutual friend to do it for him! Any ideas gentlemen??

Later on in the day she calls me into her office and she says that she see's no point in me continuing to come in after I gave my resignation. Which is completely unfair because prior to me 3 other people left and there 2-3 weeks notice was accpepted!!! ; ;She pulled my former co-workers out of the room in front of me and told them that I was quitting and she was taking it personal, and that shes really upset and knows that I know shes upset.... Title: I don't know how to deal with myself help what do I do?
Description: Hi I need some help. I don't know how to write this but I'm just gonna go ahead and yeah. I think I have depression. Actually I think I've had it for the past two years.  It started when I moved towns. Leaving all my friends behind and going to a new school was very hard for me. Getting bullied by the people at my new school made it even worse and then my friends from my old school started talking crap about me and I felt like I had no one and wanted my old life back. I made new friends eventually and told my old friends to get stuffed. Which has made the past six months a lot easier but then my sister broke up with her boyfriend who was like a brother to me though I don't blame her and my mother has become extremely harsh. She cares more about my school than my physical condition. She doesn't believe in depression and reckon people should just get over themselves. the past seven months I had a thing with a guy and I slowly fell in love with him. Being the first guy I ever cared about he meant a lot to me. But a month ago a week before my birthday I found out he was chatting up a bunch of girls. Which hurt me deeply. And now these past weeks have been so hard. I feel like I've moved on from him and now I'm just trying to cope with myself. I can't do school and my self harm has stopped but my worthless feeling and sadness is unbearable. I'm to scared to talk to my mum cause she'll laugh at me and I can't talk to a doctor cause I feel pathetic about it like it's not a big deal.

Title: Why does my hair fall out everytime i do an oil treatment?

I figured it was just that oil, so i tried castor oil a few weeks later and the same thing happened! Today i tried coconut oil and yeah u guessed it a lot of hair fell out compared to usual. The thing is my hair always feels so smooth and healthy afterward an oil treatment so i don't understand why i get so much loss. I don't even have itching or rashes or anything like that. What is causing this? I usually massage it into my scalp when my hair is dry, let it sink in for a few hours and then i wash it out. Any help would be great. Any tips?

Title: How do people go to Heaven?
Description: So if God was to love everyone and if a sinner one day decided to live a good Christian life they would go to heaven right? ; ;So if someone was bound to go to hell due to all the sins he's committed in his life i.e. sex, drugs, murder, etc. and one day he asks for forgiveness he would go to heaven right?  ; ;If the answer is no because the man has sinned, would it make sense to look at everyone as sinners?  ;Would that mean that everyone is damned?  ; ;To think that all men must believe in God for salvation is false?  ;If you're trying to refute by saying we must believe in God to be saved, the sinner mentioned above should be saved right (i.e. dictators, serial killers, rapists, etc.)?  ;Would he be saved he was to convert from whatever religion or not to Christianity/Catholicism? ; ;If not how does God determine who goes to heaven? If all men are sinners?  ;Say there was a Christian serial killer for example, would he have priority over a non God believing thief in going to heaven?  ; ;If we weren't looking at the world in that perspective. Say, there is a virtuous man that doesn't believe in God. Would he be damned for not believing in God?  ; ;And I'm not stating or implying that there must be a God. This clearly a series 'what if' questions.  ;I'm not hating on any religion just wondering. Please don't respond with Bible verses. ;  ;I may have reiterated many of things so just bare in mind since I'm to lazy to go back and fix it.  ; ;Thanks.

Title: Buying a fixer upper?
Description: We have been living in our current home for over 5 years. We have been given the option to buy the home at a decent price but there are some issues with the home. The major issue is water damage in the garage. We are going to get an inspector to come look at the house before we make a decision but I thought I would get some advice in the meantime. Homes like this one, a 3 bed 2 1/2 bath brick in a nice neighborhood typically go for around double what we will be paying for the home if we decide to go fwrd with the purchase. Anyway I know that I can't get much info until I know the reason behind the water leak in the garage. From my research it seems it may be due to cracks in the brick and may need crack and joints sealed but I am not certain. The leak only happens when there is a strong, strong wind during a rain storm. Any other time it rains without a strong wind there is not an issue. This would be me and my husbands first home that we own and it would be nice to settle down here and raise our family. I did a lot of moving around when I was younger and do not want my kids to go through that. I am curious if we decide to buy how much money we may end up putting into the home. If we could get the garage fixed up I'd like to convert that space into a living space. Update the ac unit and remodel the laundry room. The other parts are basically cosmetic that we could do over time. Thanks for any advice.

Title: Can the tools we use to enhance our perception of reality improve indefinitely?
Description: Tools like these: hearing aids > cochlear implants, glasses, etc. I guess I could have just asked whether or not image quality on a digital camera could improve forever. I don't think so though. I think the universe exists outside our human brains, & therefore there must be a limit on how good it can be, although I'm not sure how we define such a quality? By how much information we can extract from it? I guess what I'm getting it is whether or not there's a limit to how much humans can experience life & what that says about what it means to be human.

Title: Have Christian "Scientists" changed their minds in the face of this kind of loss?
Description: This is especially sad for me as I'm an insulin-dependent diabetic: ; ;"In Florida Amy Hermanson aged 7 died of diabetes. Her parents are members of the Christian Scientist Faith and claimed their religious beliefs kept them from taking her for medical attention." ;http://www.geocities.com/Heartland/Woods/1327/child-abuse.html ; ;How do you let this kind of thing happen?  What God would decree that you let your child die in this way? ; ;What a way to go.  Low blood sugar can start out with a cold sweat initially light-headedness inability to focus.  If it's severe you might collapse vomit go into convulsions fall into a coma.  If you can't get your blood sugar levels back up brain cells begin to die.  If you don't get medical attention you die. ; ;How could any parents stand by and allow their child to die in this way?  Worse how can they do it based upon what they call teachings of God?

Title: Does this mean it's just about over?
Description: I'm currently in a long-distance relationship with my girlfriend whom I've been seeing for well over a year. With the start of the new academic year we found ourselves at different universities quite a distance apart. Though we've been staying in touch and visiting each other ever 2 weeks or so lately things have started to slow down. With exams coming up there's no opportunity for us to see each other for a while. ; ;Then we had a discussion about it where she asked me "When's the next time we'll live close to each other?" not just visit but live. She mentioned that "she doesn't like the distance thing" and we agreed that neither of us could really move closer to the other... the conversation kind of died off there despite several attempts to revive it from both sides. ; ;Do I take this as a sign that it's over or at least about to be and she can't deal with the LDR any more and wants to see someone else closer to her or was she just voicing her frustration and I'm overreacting??

Title: Do I have any chance in Berkeley or UCLA with two Ds on my senior first semester?
Description: I am a high school senior who applied for UCLA and Berkeley. In October my step-brother died and my family was just having a terrible crisis especially me. I took it really hard and I was just a mass. My grades obviously suffered since when your brother dies and your mom is about to kill herself too the numbers in calculus or atomic orbitals in chemistry don't come into your head too well.  ; ;But after a while I realized I made a huge mistake in giving up my dreams and got back on track. I started studying again and doing home work. But grades dropped too much at first and couldn't raise up. I ended up with a D in AP Calculus and AP Chemistry. ; ;If I tell my story to the UCLA and Cal admissions and sincerely ask for another chance would they be understanding of my situation? or would they just think that I screwed up because of senioritis and now I'm just making up excuses to help myself and not even consider accepting me?

Title: Can someone help me solve this probability problem please??

If the terms are acceptable it will determine whether the oil can be transported through Algeria profitably.  If profitable transportation arrangements are available it will drill several exploratory wells to establish whether Chad‰ЫЄs reserves are large enough to warrant large-scale development.  If the reserves are large enough the oil company will lease and develop the oil field.  The probability of negotiating acceptable terms with the government of Chad is .8.  The probability of arranging transportation through Algeria is .7.  The probability of large enough reserves is .9. ;

Title: For Your Information ~ RE Ovulation?
Description: For all of you that frequent this board with the I am Scared I am Pregnant Post.  Let me enlighten you on a few things to put your mind to rest.  ; ;1.  If you are on hormonal birth control (pills shot patch etc)  you do not ovulate.  The only way that you will ovulate is if you are taken your birth control incorrectly and inconsistently. You do not need to track your fertile and nonfertile days because everyday is virtually nonfertile if you are taking your BC correctly and consistently.  ; ;2.  If you are not on hormonal birth control  you will most likely ovulate.  Beware of reading things that tell you you will ovulate on the 14th day of the month.  This varies for every woman and for every cycle.  In this case you need to use condoms to prevent pregnancy.   ; ;3.  If you experience an oops and you ARE NOT on hormonal birth control use Plan B to ward of an unwanted pregnancy.  If this tends to happen alot then look into taking hormonal birth control .

I failed math last term but I am really trying my best to get my grade up really really. At this moment I am kind of feeling hopeless. I really want to study psychology abroad in the U.S. But I‰ЫЄm scared b/c of my grades is not good enough. I don‰ЫЄt have a lot of extra curricular activities I am learning to play the guitar currently and I do photography and art on my own. I don‰ЫЄt even know if that counts. A couple of years ago we moved around a lot and we lived in the U.S for a while. Whilst in the U.S I got all A‰ЫЄs and was extremely smart.  ; ;We then lived in Indonesia my dad worked for the University of Hawaii. I used to teach English classes at the local village where we lived. I was 13. I was home schooled. Then I went to the very small international school there and didn‰ЫЄt really get good grades there but I learned to speak French and Indonesian. Then my dad died and we had to come back to South Africa and I had to live with my aunt for a while b/c my mother had a breakdown. After that we moved again and my mother couldn‰ЫЄt find a job for two years. I couldn‰ЫЄt deal with everything in a big school so I got put in the private school.  ; ;Since my dad died it has quite traumatized me the whole ordeal but I‰ЫЄm dealing and dealing with being a teenager. My dad was a well known international man. He did a lot of good work and has a lot of contacts over seas. He was a good man who worked hard. He was very well known at the University of Hawaii. I wish to continue his legacy there. I have been reading up about getting into universities and stuff and I don‰ЫЄt know. I‰ЫЄm feeling hopeless at this very moment. Like I don‰ЫЄt have a chance. I try really hard I do. And I am determined to prove myself. I know I should take the SAT‰ЫЄs and stuff. Will they accept me? Will I be good enough? I need advice. I know that I will prove myself as a good psychologist and will do well. After all I am my father‰ЫЄs daughter. But I don‰ЫЄt know if anyone will give me a chance. Any advice.

Title: Husband's Cell Phone Records - Please Help?
Description: Back in November 2006 my husband's ex-girlfriend contacted him through classmates.com.  I was not aware that they were e-mailing each other and found out some time in December 2006.  I read all of the e-mails and they were strictly platonic.  Although I was upset I got over it because I have been with my husband for 20 years and thought it would be ridiculous to worry about a relationship that occurred 22 years ago.  I always suspected that they had talked on his cell phone but I did not ask him about it.  His cell phone is a company phone so we do not get the records.  Very long story short we are involved in a health insurance appeal and they have said that my husband called the company in November and December 2006 to discuss the claim.  We are adamant that he did not call them during this time and now need to produce the call records.  Now my worst fears may come true when I see the records.  If her # appears should I confront him or let it go??

Is it wrong/rude and petty for me to do this to him?
Description: Last year this guy that I vaguely remember from college messaged me on facebook wanting to get together for coffee. I had just broken up with boyfriend so I said sure. We seemed to hit it off and started going out together once or twice a week.  ; ;Then after a month he was suddenly really busy. We were supposed to go to this big fancy dinner some congressman was sponsoring then at the last minute he was like "Oh I misread the invitation. It's a family event that takes place during the day and I am working until 7"  ; ;Then he emails me asking if I knew any churches where he could meet some single christian women b/c the dating scene sucks in our neighborhood. Another two weeks go by and he texts me randomly at midnight and goes "I AM OFFICIALLY A REDSKINS FAN!!!"  ; ;I didn't respond and took him off my facebook friends list. He sent me a friendship request to be put back on and I denied it. Then I got back with my boyfriend and we got engaged. THEN boyfriend and I broke up again.  ; ;Now a year later that same guy sends me a text message like no time has gone by asking about how i am how's my family and if I wanna get together for lunch because he misses our conversations.  ; ;WTF?! i told him that i am really busy right now (just like he told me back then) and i'd get back to him. I plan to never call.

Was it right to do this to my friend?
Description: So I was supposed to be going to the fair with my friend for her birthday. I really wanted to go. But I needed to put my stuff in her car when we met up at the fair so I told her Thursday like several times about that and she said 'okay'. Friday I tell her several more times about it and she says 'okay'. When I get home its raining right? Well she calls me and says the party is canceled. Then she calls me a few minutes later to say the party's back on because it stopped raining. Then every 10 minutes she would call and move the time up 30 minutes to meet up with her. My parents were not happy by this point. I finally get on the road and am fixing to pull into the fair parking lot and I call her to make sure she's there. But she's not! She says it will be another 15 minutes before she gets there and I was late on the original time! I finally come back and am pulling into the parking lot when I see her. I roll my window down to tell her to wait on me (like she was supposed to to begin with) and then she says hey and runs off with her other friend. I park and my dad is walking me up to the gate. (by this point we are all mad) I call her to ask her where she is and she says shes getting her ticket and going in. and i say "but arent you supposed to wait on me and then go to your car to drop my stuff off?" *remember i have to drop my stuff off or i wont be able to spend the night* she then says "o well sorry we're not going back to the car." i tried to explain to her that she promised that we would go to the car but she didn't care and wasn't paying attention so I said "screw this i'm going home!" and hung up. you must understand that she was being very inconsiderate but she also really wanted me to go. Was it the wrong thing to do or good to teach her a lesson about being a good friend and remembering things? ;plz help my friendships on the line. ;thnx ;:)

Title: chase after childhood love?
Description: it started during childhood. both of us were around 4 or 5 years old and i didn't know better because i was too young. i would run around telling her mom and dad that i loved her and that i would marry her and that her dad was my father in law and her mom was my mother in law. i was only 4 or 5 i was too young to understand what that really meant. me and her live in two different worlds. she lives half way around the world in a poverty filled country which is my birth place. so ten years after i leave her and live in america we decide to go back to my birth place. funny we meet and all memories come rushing back. i am so shy to see her for the first time and she i dont know how she felt actually for the first day meeting me again but she did not seem normal most likely shy as well. day 2 lights go out and we kiss like crazy. of course of all the people there no one notices us in a room but keep in mind just about everyone there knew that we were crazy for each other when we were little. but no one wanted us together i think. next few days we are at at again madly in love and kissing nothing too physical. probably sixth day we are alone and lights out in bed but her mom knocks on her door. Sad part is that i am leaving her the next morning and heading for america. after ten years we meet and already we separate. we are both eighteen and she is ready to marry me me on the other hand i would love to marry her but not quite ready i couldn't support her yet. so while we are away we call and talk for hours on the phone long distance and all. few months pass and i know that i cannot marry her until lets say five more years money and career wise so i tell her i cant love her. why i said that i don't know. i broke her heart cuz she thought i would not love her not that i can not. a month later without any calling between us i find out that the ran away from home and married some other guy. after hours of calling i get a number and reach her because no one knows where she is. i dont know what to say because as soon as i hear her voice i am breath less. so i ask her if she is happy because i believe i am the reason she did what she did in running away from her home. she sounds happy and revengeful in her answer and gets back at me in saying yes. i miss her like mad. i can travel half around the world to go after her but do you think she will take me back? Yeah im mad at her for doing what she did b/c i still love her and want to marry her. obviously too late but should i try and take her away from the other guy and would she even come with me? is it just the male ego in feeling guilty that i lost her to someone else that i love her more. i feel that if some other guy touches her i do not want her back. my heart still loves her but my head does not want her back. if i was to see her again face to face i would probably take her back. its hard to let her go what should i do?

We've known each other for 4 years and been together 3 years. ; ;All I said was "I don't 'hate' kids I just like them when they're well behaved and quiet" and think of the money I'll save and all that. I can hear in his voice that it really hurts his feelings when I say that. But I don't see it as a serious relationship. I said if he's horny he can sleep with other non-virgin girls cause I'm keeping mine. But he still doesn't want to sleep with other girls. ; ;Like sure babies are cool. But the reasons why I don't want one is because: ; ;Stretchmarks ;Another mouth to feed ;Crying all the time ;Money ;It hurts giving birth ;There are so many babies without parents why do I have to bring out another one? ;I don't want the child to be like me cause looking back when I was younger I really don't like myself. ; ;Actually we're both heading into college. Title: Can high elevations cause permanent damage to a camera?
Description: I have a Fuji Finepix s700. I got this about two years ago and everything seemed fine. However last year I took it up to Mt. Washington (elevation of 6288).  The temperature at the base was in the 80's but there was snow at the top of the mountain with so much fog you couldn't see 20 feet in front of you. I don't know what the temperature was that day but it was very cold.  ; ;Ever sense that day the photos aren't as sharp but the camera seems to run the same (same lag time digital screen is fine etc). I've been using it off and on ever sense and I've been pretty disappointed with it. Would taking this camera up there have caused any permanent damage? It seems to take photos without any major problems in "best conditions" (sun outdoors etc) but is really terrible when it comes to darker conditions.  ; ;This doesn't change when you put it in auto pre-programmed modes or in manual. I've played around with the shutter speeds apertures and f-stops. I even handed it off to a professional photographer that I know to try it out (of course they are used to much better equipment to start off with so I think they just hate this camera). ; ;Long question short.... can higher elevations cause permanent damage to a camera?

Title: Freshwater Opinions about current / rate of flow?
Description: I know current is very important for the health of a marine aquarium but I don't think I have ever come across any info pertaining to current in a freshwater aquarium. ; ;I have a 56 gallon (24"x24"x18") that I have had the Marineland c-360 canister on for a year or so. Before that I had a Magnum 350. Yesterday I added the Magnum back in conjunction with the C-360 for a combined GPH flow rate of 700. The uptake is on back right of the tank and the return is on the back right pointing to the front center with two separate hoses for each at varying levels. No I realize this is enough filtration for a 200gallong tank. The magnum is just using the polishing filter. ; ;I have been observing the fish and they seem to be really enjoying themselves trying to swim in direct line of the current as if its a championship match. I have some glass fish and they get about 6" away from the current and just sit still then get blown back an inch or so. ; ;My thought is would more current ... at this level ... create healthier .. non couch potato fish at the same time keeping a higher level of oxygen in the tank due to the increased surface circulation. Will this be a healthier environment for the fish and plants. Its not blowing the plants around like crazy you can just see some realistic movement like you would expect in a real body of water. ; ;I feel like the about of water movement reflects a very slow moving stream or maybe a lake when the damn is opened and flowing an a pretty good speed. ; ;Anywho anyone have some serious thoughts and opinions about current in a fresh water aquarium?

Title: If there was a TV show about the 1970s what should its theme song be ?
Description: Imagine a weekly TV series where every episode featured a different story that took place during the 1970s . Some episodes would be about famous people and based on situations that really happened . Other episodes would be about ordinary people living their lives . It would be primarily a drama unlike "That 70's Show" . NOW -- If there was such a TV show what should its theme song be ? I only have three rules -- My first rule is that this theme song has to be a leftover from the 1970s . My second rule is that it has to be somehow reminiscent of the 1970s . Some examples would be "Crackerbox Palace" "Moonshadow" or "A Horse With No Name" . My third rule is that you can't be lazy and nominate MY ideas . What are YOUR ideas ? Would you recommend "Fly Like an Eagle" by the Steve Miller Band ?

Title: What do you think would have been the best way to bring back Christian? Was ECW a good idea?
Description: If Christian returned with Edge and went straight to the main event some fans would have not been happy. I've read a lot of people saying "He went to another company he needs to work his way back up" I personally would have liked him to return and go straight to the main event but most fans didn't want that to happen. So lets say he went back with Edge lets say he went into the main event right away...he wouldn't have gained a lot of fans...he would have lost some. The fact he went to ECW and technically returned in a main event status (whether you like ECW or not going after the title IS the main event....of that show at least). We all won this way including Christian. I didn't want him to go near Edge during his re-debut. He either would have been overshadowed or buried. On ECW I wouldn't call that "being buried" He was in the main event going after the title. He had an amazing match with Swagger for the title MANY MANY people have gained a lot of respect for him AND even Swagger. Christian worked his way back up in style. He isn't a jobber and he is going to be at Mania in a big way. He might even win. Business-wise  isn't putting a big name return on ECW good for ratings? The way it all happened it WORKED. The fans are on his side and he already made a name for himself. Only good comes from him going to ECW. Why do a lot of people argue that? Why do people say it was a horrible move. He wasn't buried and he gained a lot of fans and respect by a lot of people. How is that a bad return? Yes I agree...I would have liked to hear the commentators have a better reaction but the fact his return was a huge surprise..that made it big. PLUS Christian returning AT ALL is HUGE. I don't know if it's just me but Christian seems to be very happy. He smiles constantly. He looks content and happy. I'm sure he will be rewarded for all of his hard work not only for what he did for ECW but for all of those years he should have been given the push he never got. That push is coming and it will happen in a big way. It all works out for everyone. Am I crazy? Or does this all make sense to everyone else too?  ; ;WQ: What would have been the best way to have Christian return to the WWE? WhY?

Title: 2004 Ford Escape v6 Won't Reverse stutters while driving forward?
Description: This morning I took my car and washed it (not sure if thats important or not so I am including it.)  I then drove about 20 miles to the store. When I came out I backed my car out and it jerked a little bit then when I went into drive it began accelerating then dropping down then accelerating then dropping down.  The car (A 2004 ford escape v6 automatic) would rev up into very high RPMs if I attempted at all to go above 20 miles per hour.  I parked the car and called AAA to tow it.  When he got there he attempted to put the car into reverse to get it onto the tow truck yet it is now completely unable to go into reverse. ; ;Here is what I have attempted so far: ; ;Checked brakes to make sure they weren't locked (brakes are in perfect condition) ; ;Checked Transmission fluid (It is full yet has a light brown color to it.  It doesn't smell burnt up real bad.) ;I put the car up on jacks with one front wheel up.  In neutral the tires will move forward yet still not in reverse.  In reverse it will still not go into reverse.   ; ;Slight crunching when starting up. Yet not every time only after it has sat for awhile. ; ;Thanks in advance for any help!  -Jen

Title: 16 year old son possibly having sex with his 30 year old cousin who is an actress?
Description: My son who just turned 16 last month is going to be staying with his cousin for the next 7 days. They are not blood cousins she is my foster brother's ex wife's daughter. She's known him since birth. ; ;They haven't seen each other for 2 and a half years before that they have been fairly close with each other. In the past I've talked to her often as well but as time went by there was not as much contact. She phoned me last week and we talked shortly and said she really wants to see John again and that its been too (my son) and told me to keep it a surprise for him until the day before he leaves. ; ;Over the last 2 years John has changed so much he's completely independent and pays for all his own food and everything but we don't communicate as well. He was a small boy before and now he's already completely developed like a full grown adult. I told her to phone me as soon as he arrived as she did. Then she said she couldn't believe how much he's changed and how "good looking" he is;Which sort of threw me off balance in a way. ; ;2 days ago I got a phone call from one of John's best friend Brandon's mother(who I am close friends with)and told me that she overheard something about John telling Brandon how its going at his cousinsand bragging and saying he was cuddling with her while watching a movie at night and also that she was "massaging his hips"and has been allowing him to sleep in her bed with her since the first day. She also found traces of unclosed MSN convos on the computer. ; ;I was SHOCKED to hear every word of it and I was so much in disbelief that I haven't even bothered to call yet to ask as I am almost speechless. She was then telling me brandon said they were just "playing innocent and joking around" which I don't really know what to believe. I am especially worried as they are not "BLOOD" related. His cousin is almost 16 years old than he is I do know her quite well but its been a long time; She was successful in becoming an actress playing in smaller independent films and actually a couple big ones that have been in the theaters(hostel 2)- Lauren German. I've realized that she is a very attractive young woman a teen my sons' age would be extremely vulnerable. My son is not the type to over exaggerate things so I do believe what I've heard. ; ;I don't know for sure if they have had SEX; I'm not even sure what I should ask or say on the phone as I haven't even phoned since I heard from brandon's mom. I need some solid advice please!! Thank you!

Title: Read  "Why don't you write me a Poem?"?
Description: You‰ЫЄre reading that poem again ;The one that has made me laugh so many times ;But you read it in a voice so dark ;So sinister ;That I begin to believe that the words have changed ;Shaping a grim reality on paper ;But they haven‰ЫЄt ; ;I‰ЫЄm tired of you making up tragedy ;Tired of you writing about pain ;When the only thing you have experienced is heartbreak ;The most pathetic of all pains ; ;So why don‰ЫЄt you put down that tree carcass  ;And write a poem with true meaning ;Write me one that‰ЫЄll make me cry ;That‰ЫЄll make me respect you as a poet for once ;But you‰ЫЄll never be capable of that ; ;So there you are still ;Reading the poem that has made me laugh so many times ;In a voice of a ‰ЫПtroubled‰Ыќ teen ;Just living out a stereotype

Title: My Girlfriend cheated on me what should I do?
Description: Ok I'm going through a process of disgust betrayal humiliation and anger. Last week a found my girlfriend in bed with a guy I've known for quite some time we are friends well we were. It all started a few months ago I would see them at parties get close by always chatting but I always thought nothing of it. My Girlfriend is very shy and finds it hard to make friends so I was excited at the fact she was at leased getting some attention. I've even spoke to this guy on numerous occasions regarding my feelings towards my girlfriend as that's what friends do. Anyway like I said they would chat quite a lot in their own corner it wasn't until a few parties later where I started getting suspicious. It got to the point where my girlfriend was getting cold with me now in all honesty I'm a great guy and aint done nothing wrong to hurt her I've always been there when she is sad made her laugh had wild sex you name it she always told me how much she loved and admired me as a human being. She is 18 and I'm 23 life couldn't have been better. That wasn't the case for her. Anyway after I caught them in the act I flipped out could not believe this happened as it almost seems impossible this had to be a nightmare but of course it was reality and it was happening to me. A few days later still in a daze actually I still am she said she was sorry and did not mean it as she felt I was not giving her the attention she needed! I mean come on I was always there for her there's only so much you can do for a person. I'm so confused! She met him once and stayed over at his house her telling me she was staying at a friends. She had sex twice with him second time me walking in to her house!!!!!!! She is a very fragile girl and i honestly think the world of her. She is a total sweetheart but she lied and cheated to me. I'm so in love with her it's unbelievable! Anyway possibly being the fool I don't know but I took her back as she said it was a major mistake. What really get's to me though is the fact that he made the first move and he's supposed to be my friend!!! I'm so pissed! Anyways things were ok for a day or two but today she said she want's time to herself to think but here's the other part. I honestly do have trust in her when she tells me things she is very open and honest BUT SHE CHEATED! BUT and I believe her when she said she would not get with the other guy. I'm now here in front of a computer typing this confused she says she loves me but doesn't know if she want's to be with me but she is scared to lose me. What's going on? I'm so what? what should I do? I'm sorry at part's well probably all of it.... is this making sense? I honestly love her with all my heart and I truly believe she loves me but she obviously doesn't right? should I just walk away? hmm... anyway thank's to anyone that has to listen to my problems I'm sure you have your own to deal with. I'm just confused and need a bit of friendly guidance. Thank You!

Title: To call or not to call half brother?
Description: I swear with me when it rains it pours. i've talked to my little sister twice this week(through myspace her phones shut off) and last week i found my half brother who i havent seen in four years!We were raised as cousins and he didnt find out i was his half sister until i was a teenager and he was almost in his twenties. All this time.. ; ; I went to the bigger library in my town just because. i dont normally go but something just told me to go. As i was walking across the foyer there he was! i was so excited and so was he actually! we hugged and he told me he was in a recovery house near the library. We chatted for quite a while until he said he had to get moving or he'd be late(they have a curfew). ; ;Now i sit here staring at the number he gave me to call. I gave him mine too but he pretty much told me hes bad at calling folks. I'm just worried with everything he's going through that i'll just add to it. But on the other hand hearing from me might help? ; ;So what do you all think?

Description: Let me lay out a few facts- ;I am not a long distance runner. I am a sprinter. I know how to play soccer but I'm seriously panicked about trying out for an actual team. I can handle the wind sprints the suicides because they don't take very long and you can chug the water. ; ;I've had bad experiences on teams before. Track team in 6th I was horrible horrible HORRIBLE. 8th grade in the middle of the year my friend took me to her crew workout. I could barely run a mile in 10 minutes. Description: So her and I had a pretty big fight not too long ago.  We just made up recently.  She travels as part of her job on Sunday night she texted me asking me to call her at her hotel but I didn't get the text until later and when we talked on Monday she told me that she was having a bad day on Sunday that she wanted to fall asleep talking to me but instead fell asleep next to the phone alone :(   ; ;So we talked for a long time on Monday she wanted to get coffee that night I couldnt as I got called into the office so I suggested Tuesday...she told me it was her only day off but that she would spend the evening with me if I wanted.  I declined knowing she was still in the process of packing to move to her new place and also because during out fight she said I was clingy.  She was to go back on a plane on Wednesday.  She told me she would call me on Tuesday night and we could catch up properly and she would let me know what time she landed back home on Saturday.   ; ;But she never called...I was waiting...not sure if it was to get back at me for not calling or if she was just very busy with packing and forgot to call me.  Should I call her while she's travelling?  Or should I just play it cool and not call her?

Title: is ther hope for abusive relationships? can they be successfull?
Description: Is there any hope for me and my boyfriend for the future? I can honestly say he is the first person that i truly care about more than i have for anybody else in this world(besides my family of course). We've known each other for 3 years been fooling around for 2 years.. and finally made it official in Dec 2008. After 6 months of dating he became abusive ever sine one night when I totally went crazy on him and repeadtly kept hitting him while i was driving one night. After I did that i must say i was shocked what he did to me.. but we somhow managed to pull through and try to forget about it. But things have gotten worse. He is very abusive. I found out not long ago that he had a rough childhood. His mom was abused by his step dad infront of him until he was 12 years old. I couldn't imagine going through something like that and seeing another man beating on my mom! He has some very serious issues and honestly sounds sad to say but I want to be with him forever. We are very deeply inlove with each other. We have gone no more than 5 days without talkin to each other for the last year and a half. I can't see myself without him. But only the good side of him... I want to help him and myself as well. there is some issues that i will admit that i have problems with. very short temper as well as he does... but when were good.. we're on cloud 9. is there any hope for us.... Can a somewhat abusive relationship overcome the bad and be sucessfull? Has it ever happened before?

Title: Why is it hard to believe that the curl pattern of my hair is natural?
Description: Okay I've been completely natural for five years now. I always loved my natural hair texture. I don't know my hair type but I love my curls. I never would wear my curls. I would always have them combed out into pigtails when I was a kid and when I reached the teen yrs I got relaxers every six months; I would always flat iron my hair after blowing drying. Recently I've been letting my hair air dry so that my natural curls can show. It just easier very low maintenance. So now I get asked questions like "how you get your hair like that?" or "who did your hair?" Why is that? I didn't go to the salon so I really don't see anything special. It just look like natural hair. I love my curls and I love that my hair is kinky. When I refer to my hair as kinky some ask "what do you mean?" I think they have a different definition of kinky. Kinky comes in different textures of hair that are somewhat tight to tightly curled.

Title: How do women REALLY feel about THAT guy?
Description: He's learned to laugh at it when she jokes that he's her "girlfriend".  Honestly he even values the approval he feels when she says he's sometimes a better "girlfriend" than her female friends. ; ;When his warnings about the selfish jerk she's dating fall on deaf ears he learns to bite his tongue and not try to bring her down. ; ;He puts aside his jealousy and is happy for her when she tells him all about how hot the guy is and how great the sex was. ; ;When the jerk cheats on her abuses her or dumps her he succeeds in not saying "I told you so" but is there for to help pick up the pieces. ; ;He stays up late with her while she plays Sarah McLachlan CDs reminds her she shouldn't eat a second pint of Hagen Dasz and nods his head in agreement when she talks about what selfish pigs men are but he doesn't have an answer when she asks why all men just use women for sex. ; ;The irony doesn't escape him but he knows this isn't the time to point that out.  But it never is. ; ;He also knows that friends don't put the moves on friends who've had their self-esteem beaten down so when he hugs her it never goes any further. ; ;Do women appreciate that guy? Respect that guy?  What do they REALLY think of him?

Title: What do you think of my love poem?
Description: Siamese Quadruplets ;By Ness Gemstone ; ;Your love drips ;On my tongue ;So sweet  ;The song is sung ;In the clouds so high  ;I am ; ;I am so high ;Asleep ;Is my beauty ;Several kisses will awake  ;truly you take ;My breath  ; ;Nothing left but a sunset ;And an ocean of your love ;Flowing over me ;Spinning me ;Sucking me down into the abyss ; ;I emerge on the other side ;Transformed ; ;The land formed around me  ;As a blanket around a small child ;Sweet ;Gentle kisses ;Mystic strains form ; ;Around us ;Spinning around us ;Drowning us in common threads ; ;Diligently knitting together two heads. ;We are one mind ;One of a kind ;Out shined  ;by none ;Out of time and on the run  ;but soon to flap wild into the sun. ; ;We multiply ;four eyes multiplies four more times ;to see four more times the amount of sky. ; ;(Correction) sixteen more times the amount of sky. ;all four of us bounce by as one glob of flesh ;feeling truly alive ; ; ; ; ;.

Title: I'm 13 with Anxiety Disorder...?
Description: Kay so I'm 13 years old and I've had anxiety for as long as I can remember but I actually learned I had it and was diagnosed with it when I was about 9 or 10.  I don't wanna like sound crazy but at this point I feel like its taking over my life a little bit.  I've also been noticing OCD-ish like stuff I've been doing like I'll have to go downstairs and make sure all the doors are locked and I'll have to touch them to make sure..& I also have like a crazy thing where I think if I don't say my prayers right something terrible is going to happen.  I know this all sounds crazy but if you have anxiety you'd know.  I have tons of anxiety about other stuff too like I sit with like the same group every day at lunch (I go to a small private school so theres not many kids.) and like if someone asks me to sit at their table that day because other people that sit at my table are absent or gone or whatever I say no even though I want to say yes but I'm afraid they secretly hate me and are judging me. Sooo this is really long I'm super sorry but like the main point is do you think this is kind of like anxiety I can control or do you think I need like medication or something. I'm terrified of taking medication for  it but its driving me crazy.  Kinda looking for people that have experience with anxiety toooo...but thankyou xoxox

Title: My ex is spreading rumors about me! Help!?
Description: I broke up with my ex-boyfriend nine months ago after having been in a relationship for a year and a half.  He was emotionally abusive and I finally got out. ; ;Now I'm in a great relationship with a guy who was a friend of my ex's best friend...he and my ex weren't good friends though; more like good acquaintances. ; ;Anyway my ex is going around telling everyone that he knows the following: ; ;1) I am a pathological liar who cheated on him multiple times several of which he caught me in the act--in HIS bed. (I never cheated; he was so paranoid that I would that I wasn't allowed to have any friends even female ones.) ;2) I slept with strangers for drugs and am addicted to cocaine. (I have never even touched drugs or slept with someone I wasn't in a committed relationship with.) ;3) I stole thousands of dollars from him and freeloaded for the entire relationship. (In reality I worked two jobs to support the both of us AND went to school full-time while he sat around doing nothing all day.) ;4) I am a psycho who can't get over him; I keep calling and texting him and breaking into his apartment and otherwise stalking him.  I've even threatened to kill him if he got another girlfriend. (I haven't actually contacted him AT ALL since I left; he however used to show up at my work and scream at me so often that I considered getting a restraining order; once I told him that I would get a restraining order he quit harassing me but the rumors started.) ; ;I heard all these things from a trusted mutual friend.  I know he has written several emails to my current boyfriend telling him these and other lies.  My boyfriend loves me but I can tell that sometimes the things my ex has said make him wonder about me.  I'm so afraid that he doesn't trust me because of them.  I don't want my ex's lies to ruin my relationship; what can I do to fix this situation? ; ;Any advice or words of comfort would be GREATLY appreciated. Thanks for reading all this.

Statistics problem help?
Description: 3) Marc wants to know if the mean age of the prison population in his city is less than 26 years. He ;obtains a random sample of 25 prisoners and finds a mean age of 24.4 years and a standard ;deviation of 9.2 years. At a significance level of 0.05 what is his decision and conclusion? Assume ;that necessary assumptions hold. ;3) ;A) Fail to reject the null hypothesis of л_ = 26 with a P-value > 0.10. There is not sufficient ;evidence that the true mean age is less than 26 years. ;B) Fail to reject the null hypothesis of л_ = 26 with a 0.05 < P-value < 0.10. There is not sufficient ;evidence that the true mean age is less than 26 years. ;C) There is not enough information to perform the test. ;D) Reject the null hypothesis of л_ = 26 with a P-value < 0.05. The evidence suggests that the true ;mean age is less than 26 years.

Title: IndyCar: Round 5 the 95th Running of the Indianapolis 500?
Description: This is bigger than the Super Bowl of IndyCar. It is the Indy 500 of IndyCar. Simply the biggest single event of any sport in the world celebrates its centennial anniversary this Sunday as 33 drivers take on the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. So with the date closing in quickly who's going to drink the milk? ; ;Alex Tagliani grabbed his first pole in an IndyCar and first pole since 8 years ago in CART. This very well could be the year for the little guys to overthrow the red cars at the top. Yet there will be a mad Scotsman behind the wheel of the number 10 car in defending champion Dario Franchitti and his teammate Scott Dixon has been the most consistently fast driver of the month. Just as well Briscoe and Castroneves will be driving hard too and Will Power is poised to get his first oval win. Yet guys like Ed Carpenter Buddy Rice Dan Wheldon Towsend Bell and Oriol Servia are looking to stir up some action trying to get a huge win for the little teams all making the top 9. I've even left some major players out of the discussion which leads me to say that this will be the most competitive Indy 500 in decades and very possibly ever. ; ;My heart says Tony Kanaan. My longtime favorite driver whose KV-Lotus team has struggled with qualifying setups all year but have given him great racecars every week which added with the talent of Kanaan behind the wheel can definitely make him a bigtime contender late (remember he brought his car from dead last to 2nd and with a couple things going his way could have won last year).  ; ;But my head says differently. Unlike in nascar more often than not the best car and best team win the race at the end. That's why the red cars have dominated. With that said I have to pick Scott Dixon to win his second Indy 500 in four years this weekend. Like I said he's been the most consistently fast driver of the month being that he would go out on a practice day turn 15-20 laps max in the morning then call it a day and still end up in the top 3 times for the day. No doubt he will have a bigtime challenge but the best car and best team will prevail. ; ;Oh and in respect towards the driver that gave him his first pole since returning to the Indy 500 in 2001 and has since been kicked out of a 500 starting spot TWICE Chip Ganassi donates the winning earnings to Bruno Junquiera to find sponsorship in which he later signs Bruno for the remainder of the season as a 3rd car of his Target-Ganassi stable. ; ;If only the world could work like that. Anyway enough dreaming Who ya got in victory lane on Sunday?

Title: CALLING ALL REAL MEN!-he loves me he loves me not?(10pts best answ. in 20mins)LAST CALL?
Description: I've posted this question before but it seems the most answers come within the 1st half hr and clearly I'm not too happy with the answers lol. I need a MAN'S opinion on this one. I'll probably waste all my points asking this same question but...w/e lol I ONLY HAVE ONE QUESTION LEFT FOR THE DAY!  ; ;So I'm 20 (21 in aug) and I've been dating a 36yr old man for a minute now. Everything is awesome: we barely "argue"(if you could call it that. they're more like peaceful debates or subtle discrepancies) the sex? superb and we pretty much mesh well. My mother and my siblings love him etc. We never really confirmed we were together ( I mean when he's on the phone w/ his best friend he'll slip up and say "I'm at my gf's house "or when he intro's me to friends its always "that's my baby". He also was the first to say I love you-even then it was about a month later until I said it back) but we recently had the following discussion. ; ;ME: Babe? What are we doing? ;HIM: what do you mean? ;ME: like what are we? like how should I intro you? Hi this is my ....?  ;HIM: well when you start labeling stuff it gets complicated ;ME: sooooo...? ;HIM: Ok it's like you're so grown up but you're still a baby. ;ME: *funny face* I dont understand...elaborate. ;HIM: See! like that right there...you said elaborate. You're sooooo smart. i mean look at you! you're in college not going for one but TWO SEPARATE degrees. You want to be a botanist/marine biologist DOCTOR. You have a conditional scholarship to Stony Brook. And you're so mature. The stuff that comes out your mouth? BANANAS! Sometimes I forget you're only 20 and not 30 something. I guess what I'm trying to say is you've got soooo much going for yourself. You're still a baby. You still have alot to do and I dont want to mess that up for you. ;ME: You do realize that everything you just stated is the reason why I've never dated men my age right? I mean my mom told you that. I don't mesh well with my peers. I feel like I've aged well past them THUS why every man I've ever been interested in has had AT LEAST 7 years on me. But if thats how you feel... ;HIM: how about you ask me again at the end of the semester? ;ME: *sigh* I guess... ; ;So I guess my question is how should I feel about this? Is it me or...? I admit I know a lot but I dont know about this. Any advice? And please don't say things like "you still have so much to learn" . "just be young" or "you still dont have any life experience" You probably don't ...no you don't ...know that I've probably been through more "life experiences" than most people got through in a lifetime. So please try to provide some LEGIT and respectful advice. Thanks ; ; ;PLEASE NOTE: we've been "together" dating or what have you since i was 19 (18months) so it's not like this isn't a legit question. As i said before...I'm not a child. Do not think the number of yrs one has been on this earth amounts to the amount of knowledge one has about life. Wisdom just like love knows no age. My mother is 47 and she comes to ME for advice on the regular. I clearly know a thing or two about life outside of the text book smarts I've acquired. ;****The end of the summer semester is at the end of august. I have every intention of being with this guy for as long as he/love allows so if it leads to marriage I'm not against the proposition. I'm not looking for anyone to complete me just COMPLIMENT me. I just want someone to love and spend all of this money on when I get wealthy. I plan on having a bank account that looks like Oprah's lol =) ;****WE LIVE AND WORK TOGETHER!!! I see him all day everyday and night. We have the same schedule so I don't think he has time to see any other woman. We split everything right down the middle from rent to groceries to the car note and insurance.

Title: Ex vs. Me - I need to know what is right. What should I expect?
Description: My first real serious relationship didn't end well(Parents forced the breakup not because of me but because they think he has OCD). My ex boyfriend borrowed a ring that is sentimental to me (my mom gave it to me for graduating middle school lol) years ago to get my ring size. He will always love me and I will always love him but we both know things will never really be the same kind of love that is was.  ; ;Off and on we have talked. Recently he told me that he missed me. I didn't know how to respond because I've been dating someone else for a year. We didn't talk for about a year and all of a sudden he approached me at my locker a week or so ago. He informed me he found my ring but didn't bring it for me. ; ;The next day I reminded him to bring my ring and he never brought it for me.  ; ;Did he really find it? Did he just want an excuse to talk to me after all this time? Why can't he just bring my ring? Is he holding it for memory of me? Does he want it so that I keep asking for it? I am so confused and I really want the ring but I still really want to be his friend and he never stays in touch with me. I miss him. What can I do. Is it wrong that I think about him this much and I am still in love with my current boyfriend. I don't want to have a serious relationship with my ex because I think it's wrong. What if we were meant to be? I still have feelings for him...please help.

Title: Still terrified of stupid crap?
Description: It's 1:13am I'm sitting in my living room with the lights on. I'm sitting in the corner on my computer with my laptop and playing music. I'm tired as hell and I want to go to bed. Why don't I go to bed? Because I'm scared. I'm not scared to go to bed. No I'm scared of that stuff that 8 year olds are scared of even though I'm 16. I'm scared of the dark. I'm scared of "that guy standing behind you". I'm scared to be in a room/house alone (even if it's the middle of the day). I'm scared to the point where it's really difficult (to nearly impossible) to leave a place that I have deemed safe. (A place that qualifies as "safe" is generally a corner where I can see everything). Shit I'm even scared of mirrors.  ;What the hell?  ;Can anyone give me any reason why I should be scared of this stupid shit? And how to get over it?

Title: How to reduce lag on Adventure Quest Worlds?
Description: I recently became a member in AQW and have noticed a bit of lagging when around a few people or attacking monsters. Being a member hasn't anything to do with the lagging and I have tried lowering my graphic option to Low turned off pets capes helmets etc... but I just can't find a solution. I mostly get it when I am fighting more than one mob or just one even. It feels like it takes forever to show my skill being used and even when it does it takes a while to hit the monster. It is sort of bare-able but if there is any solution you guys may find I would be more than happy to try it out. I have also been trying to use Game Booster clearing my cache clearing unnecessary files etc with no help. I have also been going on the member only servers due to their low population but I don't necessarilly think it has to do with anything other than the fighting to be honest and when I am around a lot of people. I have seen videos of people able to run through Yulgar (the main shop) without any lag at all but it seems when I do it it takes forever for my character to reach the opposite side and looks as if I am going in slow motion. ; ;I don't think RAM is an issue either as I can run WoW perfectly fine without any lag (I get over 100ms but the max I get is 300 at times not too bad). My router is sort of old so I may think that can be the problem. Also it could be something with the internet I am using Google Chrome at the moment but I don't know. If anyone uses a program or something that can help boost AQW I would really appreciate it if you could let me know what it is as I really like this game and I want to be able to play it lag free. Thanks!

Title: When people say they don't want to get married...?
Description: I hear people say they don't want to get married but they do want to spend the rest of their lives together because they think marriage ruins a relationship. ; ;I don't get it. Marriage to some is "sacred" but it's also a legal thing- just that really. When my dad was a young man he never wanted to get married and he didn't want to have kids out of wedlock- he almost didn't marry my mom because he was afraid to get married which means he almost didn't have me X_X ; ;I asked him why he and my mom didn't just live together instead of getting married. He told me he had changed his mind. He also said that marriage is a promise of commitment and that if you're planning on spending "forever" together you'd show your level of commitment by getting married because that means you're willing to work on the relationship and you trust each other enough to be legally and financially joined with one another. ; ;Is there any truth to this? What's the big deal about marriage? It's hard work yes but how is it different from living together?

Title: Can the popular guys like me?
Description: Okay i'm sorry that this is really long but i thought that I should say it all. ; ;Anyway I was walking with my friends when I realized we left a friend at the toilets (Oops) so we went back and as I turned around I saw this guy staring right back at me and then from then on I noticed him like everyday! Everytime we walked past each other we would exchange glances but not long enough for our friends to see. ; ;We haven't ever talked before but he has tried to make me laugh before like one time when I was in class closest to the window i was talking to my friend when she pointed outside and so I turned around and saw him making the most randomest face that I cracked up laughing and he smiled and walked off. He did it again to when I had to do a speech in front of the class I looked up at him and started laughing so everyone turned around to see what I was laughing about and he just casually walked off pretending nothing happened. ; ;I've caught him staring a few times as well like in roll class and when our classes come together but it's been like 9 months now and we stare at each other longer but still DON'T talk. I think the only thing stopping us is like a social barrier or something because he's like really popular I think and i'm just average. ; ;There's this other guy too and he's in a few of my classes and I think I catch him staring at me sometimes and he catches me staring at him a few times and it just ends up getting really AWKWARD!! But he's sat next to me a few times when he had the chance to like when there's three seats on my left he'll sit next to me instead of the other two seats and then his friends will sit in the other seats. But thing is he's popular too! But he's not like the other guy because when we see each other we try to avoid looking at each other. ; ;They're both pretty okay friends with each other I think but I don't think they know I like them both. Do guys talk about this stuff to each other?? I really want them to talk to me because I am SERIOUSLY shy so I don't really want to but I do. I'm one of those people that are really shy around people but once they get to know me I can get really crazy. Title: I think I have a slight crush on my teacher and I don't know how to act normal around him help?
Description: I know it's this is clichМ© but I think I'm starting to fall for my teacher. It wasn't all "love at first sight" and it's not even a tad relevant to his looks. In fact I remember when I first received my timetable and saw him as my teacher thinking "I heard he's not a great teacher oh wonderful I'm dreading his class already."  ;And I as sure as hell didn't enjoy the first week of his classes. He's around 8 years older than me (judging by looks) so I guess he tries to take a shot at humour for a more interesting lesson and at first I remember disliking his lessons. I don't know why though I just kept thinking "why do I have so many of his bloody lessons?"  ;Then after that first week I don't know what happened I started to get used to his attempts at humour. Then I started mentally complimenting his way of explanation and suddenly I found myself looking at my timetable constantly to check if I had any of his classes. Soon after I began to feel self-conscious in his presence and I began to fix up my hair I felt myself drawing towards him. When I'm in his classes I always sit next to my best friend and I always smile and laugh there has never been once in his class that I haven't been smiling. And it was then did I realise that I was sub-consciously acting the way I would in front of my crush. I feel like he's onto it though every time in class when he is talks to the class to give his lessons he looks around the classroom and maybe looks at one individual looking in certain directions every now and then. However he never looks at me his eyes never pass mine which I find weird every time I look and listen intently in any class the teacher looks at me back acknowledging my concentration. And I don't know if it's me not speaking loudly enough but when we exit students say "Thank you" as a polite gesture when I say it to him he doesn't seem to reply. ;I'm scared of becoming obvious in his class which may lead to me doing something ridiculously embarrassing.  ;Advice on becoming more natural and perhaps tips of getting over this (hopefully) small crush? ;Thank you!

Description: Hey guys! ; ;I am rethinking the entire approach to my fantasy series. The main concept will remain the same but I am basically changing the entire dynamic of the rest of it. People aren't kidding when they say that your story will probably change completely. ; ;In this case the opportunity (it was not available before) for having a gateway character has opened up.
