Title: Does he like me more than a friend or not? Shy guys or anyone help?
Description: OK so this guy I like (Let's call him Mike) is really hard to read. One day he shows good signs the next day he doesn't. But he still shows signs....  ;OK so on Thursday I saw Mike looking at me in class (Like a few little glances) but when I talked to him he didn't say a lot to me and he seemed kind of shy around me. Like my friend (let's call him Fred) who is also friends with Mike says that Mike has a crazy side but I NEVER see mike's crazy side he seems so shy around me......  ;And also our teacher was asking us what we did to play outside and stuff and I said that I played baseball and my teacher was like 'Baseball? Not softball? Hmmm we got a touch cookie over here!' or something like that and Mike smiled and I heard his laugh.  ;And also I was kind of talking to Fred at lunch. (He was sitting at a table far back with his friends and I was sitting at a table closer to the hallway? But we were saying hi and mouthing stuff lol and then Mike saw me and he kind of looked out of the corner of his eye at me and looked down)  ;OK but this is the weird part. OK so in american history this popular girl is like 'No one likes me!' (Keep in mind that Mike isn't popular but I really think he tries to be popular. You can tell) and then Mike's like 'I like you!' (I guess that he trying to be popular....)  ;But why does he give good signs and... unsure the next day?  ;Because on Monday he sat next to me in a group (that HE could choose) but then he moved to his friend then he kind of softly touched his foot with mine and he looked at me a lot....  ;Also on wednesday he smiled a really sweet smile when he saw my little brother in school and he seemed shy around me.... ;Oh and PS. I just talked to a friend of his and he thinks that Mike likes me but on days he acts uninterested I crowd around him a little bit and he says to crowd around a little less and to take it slowly. Is that good advice?

Title: Help please I'm not sure why I'm the way I am?
Description: Hi everyone! I'm 19 and a freshman in college and hopefully you can help me out. Well I don't really know where to start to be honest. I guess I'm not really happy. Like not happy at all. The thing about me is that I'm a happy person almost all the time but I know that I'm not happy if that made sense. By no means am I ungrateful or should have a reason to be unhappy- I go to one of the best public colleges in the world I have a family that loves me great friends (offs not a large amount) a good life overall. But there's just a lot missing from it I feel like. I see all my friends declaring their majors and relaxing their life goals and I still haven't found that and I doubt I'm any closer than I was in high school. I'm terrified not knowing what I want to do with my lifethat I might do something I regret or hate doing for the next 40 years. I just..have no idea what direction I'm going in with my life and that scares me. Another thing that I'm missing is what probably half the stuff on here is about- relationships. Now I haven't had a legitimate girlfriend since middle school and that doesn't count in the long run anyway. I've never kissed a girl and never had sex. The sex thing I'm ok with though I know that'll come eventually. But never having kissed a girl at 19? Come on you've gotta admit that's pretty sad. I even admit it. And it's not for a lack of trying either- I've asked a few girls out but it's always the same: "it's not you it's me" or basically that. And I just keep thinking if it was them wouldn't they try to make it so that it could work out rather than give an excuse? But I don't harbor any resentment at all I'd never do that to anyone. I just feel like if not now then when? So that's another thing I've got going on. I guess I'm just not happy with my life right now to be honest. And also I'm someone that gives really good advice so my friends talk about their problems to me and I don't mind helping at all I'm glad to know that they trust me and look to me for help. But at the same time I'd like someone to ask how I was doing. Even then though I doubt I would say anything..I feel like I'm bothering my friends whenever I start to talk about my problems like it's a burden to them. And maybe that sounds stupid but I've always been like this wanting to help and not expecting anything back. I guess I just want someone to ask how I was so I know that someone cared. I just see all my friends having these great lives they're figuring out what they wanna do with their careers my best friend has been with his girlfriend for two years and right now try seem bound for marriage (I'm kidding but they're great together so I hope that's the case!) my other best friend is doing great things at her college and I'm wondering now what do I have? I guess I'm not fulfilled in my life or I'm not happy or both. So after all that I guess I'm wondering- what do you think is wrong with me? Why am I this way when I shouldn't be? And is there anything you could tell me that'll help? I guess I just need some reassurance something like that. Thank you so much for reading I appreciate it a lot. I know it was a long read and you'd really be helping me by answering my questions. Thank you again :)

Title: Having hate is a sin?
Description: As a disclaimer I don't want this to be percieved as bashing the Lord. I am simply angry and confused. With that said let me explain my situation  ; ;My cousin moved in with my Aunt and I about a year ago. We've grown close since then discussing our problems looking out for each other etc. She's like a sister to me. A few months ago she met a guy I will call "D" in this post. The relationship was going well for awhile she seemed truely happy. Then D took up his old drinking habits. One day he snapped and beat her until she got a black eye. He even threatened her with a gun. Unbeknownst to me he had done this before even doing it in front of her six year old kid. The judge gave him one month in jail a slap on the wrist. Now that he's out of jail she's taken him back in. That's right that low life is under the same roof as me. This is allowed by the law as she didn't and never will file a restraining order against him. I hate him. Nothing would make me happier than to do the same things to him as he did to her. As a law abiding citizen I can't. People have told me that hating this man is a sin that leaves me with some questions.  ; ;Why is this a sin? Does God condone this mans actions?  ;How am I supposed to forgive him if justice wasn't served in this situation?  ;Even if he hasn't hit her since am I to forgive him?  ; ;Any thoughts on this would be appriciated.

Title: Just brought a stray kitten into my sunroom. Is there any way to help her calm down?
Description: I take care of three stray cats:  Baby Daddy Half Tail and Little Baby Kitten. ;Baby Daddy is a seasoned outdoor car and most likely the father of Half Tail and Little Baby Kitten..  Plus he's the father of two of my cats (we took in a stray Dolly who was pregnant last year.)  Half Tail is very meek; we were planning to make her come inside for the winter but we haven't seen her in a week.  I'm hoping she's just in heat.  :( ; ;Little Baby Kitten is of course just a baby.  So we decided to take her in tonight.  We have five other cats and a Saint Bernard so we decided to put her in the sunroom for tonight.  I calmed her down briefly by giving her wet food; she let me pet her but was more timid than usual.  (It took me a while to butter her up outside but she made great progress.) ; ;Now she's just pacing around the room meowing... Clearly very distressed.. :( ; ;I want to keep her inside because it's getting colder and colder outside.  (We live in the north-east.) ; ;Any advice on how to ease her adjustment?  I thought it'd be easier because she's still young.

Description: I‰ЫЄve been considering building my own desktop figuring as it‰ЫЄs the cheaper option rather than buying one prebuilt. ;Heres what seems good to me. ;Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K  ; ;Note: I believe this would be better than the newer i7 to save 100 bucks as I wont be doing any hard core editing/gaming that the i5 couldn‰ЫЄt handle what do you think about that?  ; ; ;CPU Cooler: Corsair H80 Liquid CPU Cooler ;Note: From my research liquid cooling is a true pain in the dick and pretty expensivemessy and you need to get a bunch of parts but it's also better then a fan and should help cpu performance.  This ones a fully contained unit though and it only cost about 80 dollars. ; ;Graphics Card: EVGA GTX 680 Superclocked.  ;Should handle any game out there pretty well plus its the superclocked edition its overclocked right out o' the box. ; ;Motherboard: Gigabyte GA-Z77X-UD3H ;Note: not sure if you said not to get ram cuz you could get it for free or just to get it cheaper but this board can support 32gbs. I think the most I could need is 8.. What do you think? ; ;ram: corsair vengeance  ; ;Note : I would get 8gbs ; ;SSD: 128gb samsung 830 series ;Note: Older but very reliable and does as well as most new shit for a much cheaper price from what I've read. ; ;Hard Drive: 2tb western digital caviar black  ;note: I know you dont need both but this way I can store all of this shit I could possibly ever need plus I would just use the SSD for paging ; ;Power Supply: 750watt corsair tx750w modular power supply ; ;Tower: Fractal Design Define R4 Case ;Note: Chose this because so long as I made no fuck ups all of this should fit fine with eachother and into this case with good space for it all. Plus ports for usb and headphones and mics and such. ; ;Dvd Burner: I don‰ЫЄt know about this one ; ;Screen: Don‰ЫЄt know about this one either ; ;Note: Would use the SSD for paging and the Hard Drive for storing shit.  ; ;Also considering using two screens for the computer. ; ;End Notes: for a 1500 dollar budget I think this works out well and should be able to handle any games I throw at it. Title: I feel like committing suicide. I can't handle this anymore.?
Description: I can't take this anymore. I've put up with it for too long. The torment the looks of disappointment the looks of pity. It's all going to end soon. I get picked on almost everyday because I'm different. No one is alike but of course I have to stick out like a sore thumb. The ghetto black girls (no offense) at my high school make fun of me the most. Most days I ignore it but not today.  ; ;They think I don't hear them and they are "quiet" (hahaha-.-) but it's useless. Their making it quite obvious that they're talking about me because they laugh and stare at me all the time.When I look at them they laugh and look away quickly. I don't get my hair fixed on a regular basis and they pick on me for that. They say it's "nappy". I'm an African American and I was adopted by a white family. I don't talk ghetto (more like improper) because I was raised differently. I get picked on for that because I'm not considered black at my school they say I'm white. Stereotypical. ; ; I haven't told my friends and I think I'll keep it to myself. I might tell my best friend Hope I don't know though. I feel so alone sometimes. Even when I'm surrounded by my friends I feel like I'm alone. They stick together and in the end I have no one really because Hope leaves school to go to college sometimes. I just feel so alone and I don't want to talk to an adult. I'm 18 and I just want to talk to my friends. I'm just so tired of this. I feel like cutting to take my pain away. I've done it plenty of times before... If it happens again I might take my life. I just can't deal with any of it anymore. I'm just done. ; ; I've gotten picked on most of my life. It's not fun and I don't feel like continuing to live if it happens again. Will pills kill me? A gun is too messy and hanging myself is too much time... I want the torment to just stop!!! I haven't done ANYTHING wrong to anyone and I don't understand why I get treated this way.:'( Am I getting bullied?

Title: Naruto question: Kakuzu vs Sasori?

With his beasts and his elemental blasts he could over power Sasori's main puppets Hiruko the third Kazekage and himself if only by sheer numbers.  The biggest threat Sasori would have is his 100 puppets and maybe his poison.  His poison would have to hit Kakuzu's skin which would be very difficult give his Iron Skin ability and hitting his tentacles would be useless.  Sasori's 100 puppets would be able to over power Kakuzu and his beasts separately but if Kakuzu combined with them his sheer mass of tentacles and combination jutsus like blast flames and final shot could easily decimate Sasori's entire puppet army.  In the end Kakuzu wins.

Title: I found my neighbors cat dead what do I do?
Description: I was walking to school when I noticed a cat lying down in the sunlight and I took a closer look and it was dead. Bleeding a bit. I was horrified and to make the situation worse it looked exactly like my neighbours cat their NEW cat. I thought I'd leave it and think they'd spot it but when I came home from school it was still there. So I called up the local vets and they said unless I can bring it to them then they can't do anything about it. I told them that I think it was my neighbours so they said to try and get hold of them. I did and she answered and I asked when was the last time she'd seen her new cat she said the previous night and asked why. Then I was 99% sure it was her cat. So I didn't know what to say and I kept stuttering and she was starting to get worried and then I said she may have been involved in an accident and she burst out crying and then she asked for my mum and then she passed the phone to one of her colleagues and my mum explained the story. Anyway my brother went to see the cat and on the way saw one of the cat's owners (our neighbours) and an owner said have you seen my cat and my brother pointed and then he said 'oh sh*t that's my cat' and apparently bent over the cat and walked home really shocked. Did I do the wrong thing to tell them?

Title: How to accept the pain of a breakup?
Description: So I broke up with my girlfriend a couple days ago. ;I was a virgin and she was not and it bothered me and made me sad that I couldn't be her first or that she had even had sex at all and I had waited for her. Anyway I suppose the guilt got too much for her and she told me she didn't want to be a "tragedy" in my life. She had also told me unnecessary details about what she and the guy did which probably stressed me out a lot... Anyway I wish I had shut my mouth about what it was when I was sad but then she probably would have broke up with me for not opening up to her... ; ;It sucks because everything was so magical and natural with us. Like the sorta thing you see in movies thats how it was with us. We didn't have to force anything it all just happened. Anyway I think its possible that I may be in love with her even though we had only been together for 2 months I have known her since February. While it hurts to know I can't be her first it hurts even more to live without her but I realize the pain would likely come back if I got back together with her so its probably for the best that we be apart to be honest. :\ ; ;I've been looking at girls on OKCupid since we've broken up and I've probably looked at at least 40 girls and I don't see a single one who could even get close to her and a virgin as well. I'm starting to feel like virgins are a "endangered species" and I'm looking for a needle in a haystack and I regret my past of trying to live life legitimately and waiting for the right girl. But what do I do?

Title: What height will I be?
Description: Hi im a male and am currently 17 years and 5'7. My dad is 6'0 and my mom is 5'5. Im pretty frustrated with my height as all my brothers and sisters are very tall for their age and im the odd one out. I started my growth spurt pretty late at 14 when i was 5'0 and have only grew 7 inches in nearly 2 years during my first growth spurt.I grew a good bit for the for 2 years but i havent grown at all in the last year. I have hair on my armpits and have small hairs on my face which i shave. . My uncles are pretty tall on both sides . I am pretty scrawny for my age and i have very slim build. I started going to the gym and they told me that i was in the lowest percentile for muscle mass for my age. And also my penis is only still pretty small tbh does this mean i still have growing to do as well? Is there a second growth spurt coming? Is there a chance I can still grow?

Title: Nobody knows how unhappy I am?
Description: I am only 15 I am however very mature for my age compared to a lot of my friends people mistake me for 18 etc. But nobody knows how unhappy I truly am. During the day when I am at school I smile have a laugh with my friends and genuinely feel okay however when I get home it's like all the grey is sucked out of my world. I go to my room shut my door and cry. I don't mean a silly pathetic cry I mean I cry to the point where I have sore heads and feel sick. I cry myself to sleep. I am so insecure I hate every little thing about myself and would change it all in a heartbeat. I cut myself and the sick part is I actually like the sight of the blood it makes me feel human when I feel pain it makes me feel normal. So yes you could say I enjoy cutting myself which is totally fucked up I know. I don't get it I have a great life my parents are wealthy my friends are nice but school is stressing me out but I am a straight A student. I am surrounded by thousands of people yet every day feel so alone. Nobody knows anything about me not a soul. My grandfather did recently die a couple of months ago it didn't have a major impact on me as I wasn't close to him but it did have a huge impact on my mum. My family has a history of depression too. Nobody knows about this well except you guys who are reading it but that's okay cause you don't know me. I do not want to tell anyone they will never understand. I do have good friends I guess but I don't trust them especially with something like this. Don't hit me with the whole "You need to go see a doctor" bull shit or "Tell a parent" cause regardless of what you say I am not going to do it. I don't want the sympathy vote or the "attention seeking whore" comments I just want to know I am not alone. I want to know that it will get better. I NEED to know it will get better because if it doesn't I don't think I can cope.

Title: Is the school being fair about this situation?
Description: Well I go to a state school that has pretty bad grades. Last year in year 9 I did unit 1 of my English language gcse (counts as 40%) using the AQA board and got an A*. I begun year 10 thinking I would carry on with the coursework I had left and the speaking and listening exam. So I went to the head of English to ask her what I need to do now but instead my head of English said that because every year 11 got lower than a B in the aqa board they changed the board to the Cambridge iGCSE so I need to redo everything and that my previous GCSE that I had done wouldn't count. Her excuse was that the AQA board had a lot of coursework and she doesn't have time to spend with me as she has a lot more students to think about. She also said that the iGCSE is an easier route as there are only 3 pieces of easy coursework and an easy exam rather than the AQA which has 5 pieces of coursework and 3 speaking and listening exams. Is this even fair? What can I do about this?

Title: Is this girl into me?
Description: Two girls: "Girl A" and "Girl B" ; ;There's this beautiful and really friendly girl that's been in my life for maybe eight months now (Girl A) she always talks to me or tries to every chance she gets she compliments me on how I look and act we inbox over Facebook frequently she sometimes stares at me when we're distant and then turns away if I notice it  she shares stuff with me that she classes as secret and she pulls this cute smile/giggle/look away thing and blushes when I tell her she looks good or her hair is nice etc. ;We also have in-depth personal chats quite a bit. ; ;One problem is that I sort of flirt with this other girl in my class that I kind of like but feel as if I'm beginning not to like (Girl B) when I do this Girl A always later on asks stuff like: "sooo.. how is she going?" or "..What's up between you two?" or "What kind of stuff were you guys talking about?..". ; ;I don't mind Girl A asking me those questions and I can see she's trying not to be intrusive about Girl B but I get a feeling just by the anxious/worried sound in her voice that she's concerned I like Girl B? ; ;Another example is when Girl B kissed me on the cheek one day and the next day Girl A just started talking to me about how the guy she loves likes another girl she eventually started crying to me so I hugged her and comforted her but no matter what I asked she wouldn't tell me who this guy was she said "I just can't" and "If I tell you it will make things worse." ; ;I later on ended up kissing Girl B when nobody else was present eventually Girl B told everyone and I think Girl A found out after thinking through these events that I'm typing up I began to wonder if it was true she loved me I'm thinking she does but even with a few convincing things I'm not "positive". ;I've started to lose my feelings for Girl B who I found out had liked me at one point as I had with her but she decided she needed to catch up on her studies further and we're now heaps more distant. ; ;I've started to get strong feelings for GIrl A who suddenly began to revert back to being happier around me and she is now not only sharing with me secret stuff but stuff she won't tell anyone else. ;I currently like her a lot and I've liked her for a long time now since back when I liked Girl B and more than I have any other girl but I have no actual evidence of her liking me. I also felt convinced she did when she began to say something like "..well I need to tell you.. I kind of.." and then she backed out of what she was saying I think she may have been trying to tell me she likes me but I wouldn't have a clue.  ; ;If it's important with judging the situation I'm 182cm tall Quite muscular but not extremely (more than most my age) I have golden like short blonde hair I love skating surfing and like most guys an Xbox. I'm 16. ; ;I think she may like me I just need some other opinions Does Girl A love me back do I take a chance and see if we have a connection? :) ; ;-Thanks much appreciatedd.

Title: Small business +military = unethical?
Description: I have always dreamed of owning my own business and 2 weeks from now I take the first step in that direction.  I will be breeding and raising exotic birds in my home which will lead to a franchise opportunity to work with even more birds and people as well as wholesale access to supplies such as cages food and toys.  Eventually I want to open a store but right now my husband's career prevents settling in. ; ;My question is about ethics and feelings so I expect people will disagree but I want everyone's opinion.  Aside from the ethical concerns about breeding animals which I assure you I take VERY seriously an ethical question has come up about my doing this alongside my husband's career.  He is an officer in the Army and he is afraid that my owning a business could make soldiers in his command feel pressured to buy from me or that they might feel that their careers may improve or suffer based on purchases from me.  I will not be advertising on post and we won't be living on post.  I will not be using our last name in any advertising bringing it up in awkward pushy ways in conversation or holding any kind of social gatherings to promote my business as is done with products like Pampered Chef Mary Kay IT WORKS OR Scentsy.  My husband will not speak about it unless asked and obviously be careful.  Lots of wives on post where I currently live have home businesses of some sort but most of them are wives of enlisted soldiers so my husband feels it is different. ; ;As sad as it makes me I am taking a hard look at whether or not I can do this or any business without compromising his integrity.  I am seeking advice from you all because on the internet it seems people are more able to give an honest opinion without fear of offense.  So do you feel that an officer's wife owning a home business given these precautions places unfair pressure on the soldiers he commands?

Title: Need advice on my recent breakup from my gf?
Description: So my girlfriend and I broke up after a year of being together. I still love her and want to be with her. She still entertains the idea of us being together and says her and I feel right. However... ; ;She has two kids and is separated from her husband (not divorced). He has been trying to get back with her and is using the kids as a trump card. They have been married ten years and he has cheated on her at least once every year they were together. He says he loves her "sometimes."  ; ;Here is where I am getting confused. She says she loves him and always will and tells me she is in love with me. She also said that going back to him will be a mistake and would do it for the sake of her kids. She tells me I am the greatest lover she has ever had and is afraid that she'll never have what we had. I also share the same fear. When her and I were "us" other people were jealous of our relationship. Everything felt right. I think she is letting her kids and manipulative husband dictate her future. I understand kids come first but I also understand there are other spectrum of live that need to be fulfilled. ; ;What the heck should I do?

Title: What is wrong with my 2007 Buick Lacrosse?
Description: The car has 80000 miles on it. Tonight I drove the car home with no issues and parked it and turned off the ignition. However I needed to restart it to move it somewhere else a few seconds later. But the car wouldn't start. Nothing cranked or sparked under the hood; the dashboard lights flickered I thought I heard the car beep (like the horn) and the radio and air blowers came on like normal. It did the same thing when I tried to start the car again. I decided to wait and came back about 15 minutes later to try again. The car started but idled strangely for a few seconds and the check engine light came on. Also the temperature gauge did not move from "Cold" at all. I moved the car and turned it off then tried to restart it again to see what would happen. Again it wouldn't start and the lights flickered and the check engine light stayed on.  ; ;I read that the car has a PK3 system and that this can cause some issues similar to this (car not starting or even sparking dashboard lights flickering). However would it cause the check engine light to come on and not allow the temperature gauge to move? What else could be the issue? ; ;Tonight was a very cold night (about 15 degrees F) the coldest night this fall/winter so far. Could this have anything to do with it? Also the thermostat was replaced about a month ago because the heat wouldn't work.

Where do I go? Will time eventually tell?
Description: My best friend and I have been going to the same school since kindergarten. We are both seniors now. This past summer he broke up with his girlfriend because he wanted to focus on the college process. I was also very good friends with his girlfriend and had developed strong feelings for her since the beginning of Junior year. Honestly the girl was greatly in love with him and he didn't want much more then the physical benefits. I kept my feelings to myself and tried to move on several times but it did not work. Coming back to school this year brought back all of the feelings but i felt like i needed to stay loyal to my friend.  ; ;About three weeks ago I was completely honest with the girl and told her how I truly felt. How happy she truly made me by just talking and being around her. We both knew this already but I was never honest with her. She essentially responded that it truly made her happy to talk to me but she was in a state of emotional fuckedupness so she didn't know how she felt about anything..  ; ;For the past three weeks we have been talking constantly everyday hanging out after school we went to see a movie this weekend and she facetimes me and all that.. but I am still so unsure of how she feels. It is flirty talking from both ends. Yesterday coming back from the movie we were talking about the outcome of all of this and she said the last thing she wants is for us to stop talking and for me to get hurt. My best friend was her first true first boyfriend and his lack of feelings and decision to "break up" really messed her up. She said that I "truly make her happy" but she isn't sure if she can "emotionally provide what I really want".  ; ;This girl is what honestly makes me happy and no matter how many times I have tried to find someone else or move on I always come back to her. Being honest with her was the best thing I have even done but I just need advice on the future of all of this. I want to be with her so badly but I'm not sure if continuing this road of hanging out and talking will lead anywhere. I honestly don't believe that it has anything to do with me as much as she doesn't want to be hurt again in high school.. What should I do?.... Thanks

What should I do?

Title: Need Computer help PC wont turn on?
Description: I built a PC with  ;Motherboard: Asus H81i-Plus ;Case: Cooler master Elite 120 ;CPU: Intel i5 4440 ;Ram:Ballistic 8gb of ram  ;PSU: EVGA 500 watt ATX ; ;I built the PC it worked then didn't turn on later that same day. Title: What info does someone need to steal my identity?
Description: I replied to an ad on Craigslist for a town home and the scammer sent me an application form. The questions seemed to be appropriate for a lease application as they are the same questions you get asked when signing a lease for an apartment so I filled it out. He sent me an email back confirming that he chose me to be the new tenant. I was suspicious of a couple of things when he sent me that email so I did a quick Google search of his phone number and found he creates fake craigslist listings all across the country. Now I'm nervous because he has my address birthday and full name. Is this enough information to steal my identity?

Title: I am in the wrong to not want kid's around when a horse is euthanized?
Description: I am a certified vet technician (Equine) and also a licensed euthanasia technician meaning I have access 24/7 to the anesthetics needed to euthanize an animal. I do no go around travelling to various places to euthanize animals like some whom are licensed do but I have had to euthanize before as I worked a placement at an animal hospital where animals being euthanized is a sad reality. ; ;My main reasoning for becoming licensed in such a sad practice is because I work full time at a horse riding barn (Which attaches to a small equine hospital for all livestock tiny facility it is only used for overflow for the much lager hospital and birthing our mares) where I instruct lessons train horses ect. ; ;We have a very old gelding at the barn who has gone blind and now coliced his second time since Christmas and his owner has finally agreed with him being euthanized. She of course asked me if I would do it much preferring a "Friendly" face around her boy when he passes away ultimately. I have agreed but it has caused a stir as her three children whom are 4 7 and 9 are very attached to this horse and love him dearly would like to be there as their buddy is put to sleep. ; ;BUT I have made it clear I do not want the children around during the euthanizing. For a few reasons euthanizing an animal is obviously never pleasant or a positive experience it can actually be quite tramatic. Secondly horses when euthanized as you all know are sedated first

I asked him what was wrong and he said he was tired and stressed from work and he apologised. Two weeks he collapsed at work and ended up going into hospital for 3 days because he was so tired and ill! I asked him to call me when he got out of hospital so we could talk and I wanted to check he was alright he didn't call I should of probably called him but I didn't want to seem needy. Since texting saying he would call me a week ago he hasn't text me once we haven't seen each other in 3 weeks. I'm thinking he's lost interest and that's it for me and him I can admit that but if he wont text me how can we talk about it?! Title: Is the Gay Agenda endangering the First Amendment?
Description: I feel like America's "Gay Agenda" if you will is being taken way too far and it is actually threatening the First Amendment of this country.  Nowadays whenever a celebrity or public figure publicly denounces gay marriage he or she is immediately torn apart by the media and an NFL player was actually fined the other day for voicing his disapproval of the lifestyle.  Then you have the Chick-Fil-A incident from several years ago and the Duck Dynasty guy face punishment for their views on homosexuality.  And the thing is none of these people said that they hated homosexuals.  They might disapprove of gay marriage or the lifestyle but none of them even uttered the word "hate."  Am I overreacting or is this a legitimate issue in our society?  This is not the United States of America that I know and love!

Title: I think I might have a mild case of social anxiety?
Description: Okay I've taken an online test and it said it was extremely probable. I've noticed this ever since I started secondary school and I'm now 14. I can't ask someone in a shop a question if there is someone behind me! I'm very self conscious around boys and populars. When I was younger I had a huge fear of death! When I'm out shopping I'm nervous just incase I bump into anyone from school. I can't answer questions in class. If I'm ill in the middle of then night and I have to tell my parents I can't. I will stand outside of the door debating about it. I can't return items to the shop. I don't like it when teacher watch over my shoulder when I write. I also avoid using public toilets! I think I have a really mild case of it! I'm not shy i could be really confident for a week and then one day I could just start feeling very self conscious! I feel as if I have like sudden bursts of anxiety! I've also notice I rub my hands hard when I feel uncomfortable! I don't think people will believe me though because I can be confident one minute then shy the next. It doesn't affect my life in anyway. I just don't want to self diagnose!

My son hit a utility pole in the neighborhood. Advice?
Description: This is his first accident ever and its completely scaring him. ; He was making a turn which was too sharp and tried to press the brake but accidentally pressed the gas pedal instead. The car took little damage just a little dent to the front and a damaged light which is fixable and easy to replace. The pole however I am not quite sure. He told me he saw sparks flying out but nothing more. No one else was involved in the accident just him and the pole. He was scared and drove right home to tell me. After a couple minutes the company who owns the pole came by to the drive way and inspected the car damage he didn't leave any paperwork for me (I did not talk to him he just went to the drive way and saw the damages and left). The company is currently fixing the damage so I am assuming some houses lost power.  ; ;I guess my question is how much will this cost me? How much will be the repair damages to the utility pole? Title: Should I leave my boyfriend for a shot at my crush?
Description: Hi  ; ;I am very conflicted with my feelings right now. ;I've been with my boyfriend for over 3 years and I know would be my forever guy if I wanted...I've recently developed a crush--this is the first time I've developed a crush like this. I'm in university and share an office with my boyfriend so we're together day and night basically. There's this other guy who runs a centre on campus and I have been volunteering there as I'm genuinely interested in the cause. But I am having serious feelings for this guy. I am emotionally and physically attracted to him and we seem to have a good amount in common so far. He has said some things that seem like he may like me (i.e. hypothetically saying he would get me a Valentine's gift and saying how it may just be him and I watching movies at these events we organize) but I can't tell for sure. I've also wondered if he's straight or not so that's another problem. I come up with things to talk to him about every day and I stop by and sit in his office for a bit and he seems happy to see me and chat with me. Sometimes I walk by his office though and there's often a girl in there and I don't know if she sort of works with him or keeps him company in there but it bothers me so much! I cried today because I felt so stupid and sad when I walked by his office and saw her in there. ; ;I have been feeling extremely guilty for these feelings as I have a boyfriend who is very loyal and I do love very much.  ; ;Please I need help figuring out what to do.

Title: What is the strangest coincidence you've ever experienced?
Description: mine was this: ; ;i work at a place where a UPS driver stops by every day. It's usually the same guy Calvin. One day he stops by with a package in his hand he's not delivering it to us though it's not ours. He's having trouble finding the address that's on the label of this small package. There is no "Powell Road" in our zip code but there is a "Howell Road". After checking with the people at the Howell Rd address (thinking it was a simple typo in the spelling of the street name) it wasn't theirs. ; ;He decided to ask me about the address because he just so happens to know I am very familiar with the area so he has me take a look at address label. ; ;I take a look and nearly fainted. The package was addressed to my father-in-law! He goofed on the last digit of his zipcode when he ordered his stuff and thru a strange series of events I was the one Calvin asked about it. My father-in-law lives about 15 miles from where this happened so it really is kind of bizarre.

Mourning the death of someone you've never known?
Description: There's this girl who lives in a town about an hour away from me. She was friends with my boyfriend who also lives there which is how I know about her.. She died several months ago. He really adored her and wanted to be with her but he never got that chance. He still has her up on a pedestal which makes me inexplicably jealous and only adds to this confusing mix of emotions.  ;I never even knew she existed until after she died but I saw everything my boyfriend said about her and her instagram and things that her loved ones were posting about her (her sister for example) and it completely shattered my heart. I've read a lot of her sister's posts and it hurts a lot. From what I heard she was a very sweet and loving person and she was so beautiful. I saw a video dedicated to her by her sister and it shattered my heart. I cried my eyes out and I still feel an ache in my chest when I think of her. How can I be so upset over a girl I never even knew?  ;I feel like I knew her personally. I don't know why I feel like this but it's very emotionally distressing. My heart feels heavy. I can't stop wishing that I'd known her. I pray for her and when I hear a song about death I can't help but to think of her and cry.  ;Her friends' posts are really upsetting for me to see as are my boyfriend's... ;Is this just a lot of empathy? Am I just too emotional? I am very sensitive. I don't know why this is happening but her death hurts like I was a friend of hers even though I wasn't.

Title: Advice from birth mothers who gave their children up for adoption...?
Description: I'm a single mother of two beautiful amazing girls ages 5 and 2.   ; ;Please do not judge me for what I am about to write and ask. ; ;I have suffered from bi-polar depression and severe social anxiety for years and this past December I voluntarily put myself into a psych ward for the second time in 3 years.  In January DSC became involved and removed my children from my care because they decided I wasn't yet mentally fit to take care of them.  Luckily they were placed with my mother but she is 62 years old and not in good health so long term is completely out of the question. ; ;Two weeks ago I got a letter of notice to vacate my apartment by March 9 or they will start eviction proceedings.  Because of this I lost my HUD voucher.  I had an eviction from 2011 and all the apartments I have called or emailed all denied me because of this.   ; ;I have been doing everything I need to do to get my girls back but I feel like I continue getting thrown these hurdles.  I am a true believer that everything happens for a reason and I can not even believe I have been thinking about this but to be a great parent love isn't enough and I feel sometimes I won't be able to provide them everything they need. ; ;I guess what I am asking is are there any women out there who gave their older children up for adoption and why and do you regret it or not?  Also if anyone knows of a forum for issues like this I'd greatly appreciate it.

Title: Feel helpless and a failure most of the time. Is there any hope for me?
Description: For several years I feel like I've been stuck in such a terrible rut that no matter what I do or try nothing seems to work. I've been stuck at the same dead end job for several years and I really want to move on because I do have a degree but I just struggle to obtain something better. I feel so stuck in life and I struggle with depression and anxiety quite a bit. I do see a therapist for talking and psychiatrist for medicine and it does help at times but it always seems like it wears off eventually and I fall back in my rut again. Death was once a fear of mine but at times I can see why people commit suicide. It's something I really don't want to do but at times it can be very tempting when you feel like you're keep getting told the same old thing about hope all the time. A lot of my past still affects me and I'd like to be involved in things such as a bowling league or join a gym but my anxiety always holds me back and I'm always afraid I'll feel uncomfortable about something or that people will look at me funny. I feel like I failed at life and there's no way to recover. Anything positive would be great to hear.

Title: I'm falling in love with a character?
Description: This might be the weirdest question you've yet come across to but I promise you I'm not a troll. So anyways I happened to stumble upon a musical that involves a certain actor playing the main character. Now I don't like the specific actor but I really love the guy he plays and the way he looks and his personality. I kind of see this person as two seperate people. Now on to the part you may find weird - I have a certain attraction now and I've never actually felt this sort of way for a person despite minor crushes - I absolutely fell head over heels for this character because of his cruel demeanor yet somewhere within that twisted head is much compassion and sorrow that dwells within him that he doesn't really know how to show. It amazes me how I have fantasies of me being the one to always be by his side and help him open up again. I had this thought that I really wanted to see him and that maybe if I started to pray that I'd meet him in the afterlife..? Even more of a weird thought but I'd like to think he's watching me and sort of like my guardian angel instead of me being his like I want to. Do you think he might be real if I try my hardest..? I really don't want any mean or irrelevant answers because this isn't a troll and I desperately want to know. Thank you!

Description: I traveled and purchased a 1 year old purebred German Shepherd almost two weeks ago. He was beautiful energetic and happy.We took him home and realized his beauty is about the only thing going for him.  ; ;#1. He does not eat: We thought maybe a couple days he would refuse and he did that was fine. We just kept him hydrated and active hoping to eventually increase appetite. Nope. He is still not eating his food. He came to us with visible ribs I really want to provide him with excellent nutrition but how can I? He just sniffs the bowl and walks away.  ; ;#2. He whines while in his crate. This is huge. Being 1 year old he still jumps and chews on things (I mean everything) so we made the decision to put him in his crate and take him out during the day. He gets two backyard play sessions 2 small potty walks and one long 2 hour walk in the beautiful park per day and sometimes the dog park and he is still whining and scraping the bottom of the crate to come out. I would love for him to be out of his crate and with me cooking and cleaning or doing whatever I have to do for that day but he would be exhibiting those destructive behaviors which I can't have. ; ;#3. He pulls on leash and barks at bicycle/runners. He absolutely goes crazy for bicycles for whatever reason. When we realized he pulled we got him a gentle leader which was like a godsend. I could walk him all by myself and he behaved but it caused some small sores on the muzzle so we stopped using. ; ;Any ideas dog experts?
